title: 'Japan's tech, India's talent led to expansion of economic ties,' says Japan's PM Shigeru Ishiba During PM Modi's Visit
description: Ishiba said that cooperation is also underway between both countries in the Artificial Intelligence, space and clean energy sectors.
content: Japan's Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba, on Friday, noted that Japan's technology and India's raw talent can make an outstanding blend of economic cooperation. Ishiba, while addressing the 15th India-Japan Annual Summit along with Prime Minister Narend... [1960 chars]

title: China Warns Against ‘Disorderly Competition’ in Booming AI Race
description: China said it will prevent excess competition in the red-hot artificial intelligence sector, a signal that Beijing wants to avoid wasteful investment even as it seeks to turn the technology into a key pillar of the economy.

title: Dell lifts annual forecasts on AI server sales boom
description: Dell raised its annual revenue and profit forecasts today, buoyed by demand for its artificial intelligence-optimised servers that are powered by Nvidia's advanced chips.
content:
